ActJudges Act
SubjectLeave of Absence to the Hon. Edward P. Belobaba
PrecisGranting of a leave of absence to the Hon. EDWARD P. BELOBABA, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, from March 18 to June 30, 2018, on account of ill-health.
